Name: VectorMan™
About the game: By the year 2049, Earth has been turned into a toxic waste dump. Humankind has fled into space leaving behind an army of mechanized “Orbots” to clean up the mess. But when the Orbot leader “WarHead” goes haywire and starts a global revolt against the humans, it falls on the shoulders of the last Orbot loyal to its human masters to save the planet.
Meta Title: VectorMan™: Jun 1, 2010, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on VectorMan™? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2010), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
